column1: Genes are thought to be involved because this condition is more common in relatives of schizophrenics.
More commonly, people with this disorder behave oddly and have unusual beliefs (such as aliens).
People with SPD may also have depression.
A second personality disorder, such as paranoid personality disorder, is also common.
See your health care provider or a mental health professional if you or someone you know has symptoms of schizotypal personality disorder.
